org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeExtendedObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels.Context

  • @JsType(isNative=true,
        name="Object",
        namespace="<global>")
public final class Context
extends NativeExtendedObject
    The option context is used to give contextual information when resolving options. It mainly applies to scriptable options but also to some function options such as formatter.
    It can also be updated adding additional properties.
    The context object contains the following properties:
    • active (boolean): whether the associated element is hovered
    • index(int): index of the associated data
    • datasetIndex(int): index of the associated dataset
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
